cause.description:
Mrs.Paula Gallants grave is marked by a wooden cross..we want to show how much our community supports mrs.gallant by raising enough money to replace the wooden cross with a tomb stone that will last for a life time.
1. To show dedication for Mrs. Gallants Death
2. To replace wooden cross at grave site with a tom stone
3. to keep memory of a great teacher alive
cause.mission: to raise enough money to buy a tomb stone for Mrs.Paula Gallant
cause.name: Tomb Stone for Mrs. Gallant
